required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Epidemiological Characteristics of Elderly Trauma Patients in Zhejiang Province and Development of Geriatric Trauma Short-term Mortality Prediction Model
clinical_study.official_title: Epidemiological Characteristics of Elderly Trauma Patients in Zhejiang Province and Development of Geriatric Trauma Short-term Mortality Prediction Model

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: This is a retrospective study. Trauma patients aged 65 years or older will be included. The aims of this study are explore the epidemiological characteristics of elderly trauma patients in Zhejiang Province; establishment of early warning score system of elderly trauma death in Zhejiang Province; and horizontal comparison of the treatment level of elderly trauma in Zhejiang Province.

primary_outcome.measure: the incidence of geriatric trauma in patients

study_pop.textblock: Trauma patients aged 65 years or older

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Trauma patients aged 65 years or older
Exclusion Criteria:
Secondary trauma due to other causes

facility.name: The second affiliated hospital of Zhejiang university, school of medicine.
